html:
10.22.21  5:50 pm   what do you think of hi hats?

      dank

10.22.21  5:25 pm   do you have caps lock on, but hold shift all the time as well?

      no

10.22.21  3:22 pm   Bill, is there anyway I can look less stupid?

      put books behind you in the video chat

10.22.21  3:07 pm   Would you be interested in making more talk/story style videos like "ball and stick"

     yes, except better

     or is it mostly full music vids you're interested in making?

     both

10.22.21  2:43 pm   how to tell apart what i want, what i have to do, what i think i want, what i think i have to do

      make up a song about it

10.22.21  2:04 pm   how do you feel about being alive

      pretty good

10.22.21  1:24 pm   when is the bill wurtz concert coming?

      i'm not sure

10.22.21  12:33 pm   do you believe in nebraska?

      yes

10.22.21  11:12 am   when's the last time you started a sentence with a capital letter

      about 54 questions ago

10.22.21  10:53 am   What do you consider "Normal?"

      something similar to most other things, if that's possible

10.22.21  10:49 am   how do you turn an idea into a fully formed song?

      just start asking yourself "what goes next (or should it end right here)", again and again and again

10.22.21  8:19 am   can you write your next song without using the word 'the'

      i could have, but it's too late now

10.22.21  4:05 am   What flies faster than the speed of sound?

      ...........light?

10.21.21  10:42 pm   what shape most inspires you?

      sphere

10.21.21  10:12 pm   What's the best song you've made

      i haven't made it yet

10.21.21  9:47 pm   What's up with "Vacationing into the center of the sun."

      that sounds like a combination of 2 different statements i posted to the expert page, at different times, both trying to sum up my exasperation with whichever endless production debacle i'd buried myself in, at the time

10.21.21  9:36 pm   what should i do as a quote for my class ring (max 44 characters)?

      'i let someone else pick my quote'

10.21.21  8:04 pm   Did you know that "more than a dream" is the first song you made where the title is exactly 4 words?

      no but that's because it's not true

10.21.21  8:00 pm   what is the best philosophy you live by

      i believe philosophies should be derived from life, rather than life being derived from philosophies

10.21.21  6:45 pm   tips for remembering your dreams?

      write them down as soon as you wake up

10.21.21  6:33 pm   what is your opinion on country music

      the fun part is figuring out what country it's from

10.21.21  6:10 pm   thank you for making the latest song. oh yeah i have to ask a question. um, what do i do if i have 5 billion things i want to do all of, how do i pick one to do? i just have to not think don't i?

      if you are a thinker, you can continue thinking. if many items seem to hold equal weight, and you have no way of deciding, then you can use a computer to randomly select one. all you have to do is count them up and input the values into a random number selector

10.21.21  6:03 pm   What is the evolutionary purpose of dreaming?

      to get new ideas

10.21.21  5:30 pm   Your latest song is very optimistic and inspirational (and also really great!), like many of your other songs. Do you write these optimistic songs to inspire yourself, or are you writing them to inspire others, or both?

      both

10.21.21  5:19 pm   What's your favorite individual moment in More Than A Dream , if you have one that is?

      somewhere around october 2021, when i realized it may be possible to make a decent video relatively quickly without hating myself too much

10.21.21  4:32 pm   can you tell me how to wake up?

      no. that's because i don't know how to do it

10.21.21  4:12 pm   I asked What Dreams are made of and you just said "you" but what am I made of?

      time

10.21.21  3:22 pm   Can music get too musical?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.21.21  3:11 pm   Why is the way you say "complete" in More Than a Dream so satisfying?

      it might be this: i sang the vowel sound very short, and also made the accompanying chord/bass there also equally short, to match

10.21.21  2:52 pm   the bridge in long long long journey sounds absolutely incredible. words can't really describe how good it is, and I suppose that's why it is the way it is.

      holy smokes you are very friendly

10.21.21  2:36 pm   salutations mr. wurtz. over a year and a half ago, i was half asleep and listening to one of your songs. for some reason, my half asleep brain felt like i comprehended your songs and the reason for existence. now i don't remember a thing that i could've possibly realized. is there a reason for that?

     i think so

     do your songs hold the secrets to the universe? 

      they're supposed to. that is my goal, as impossible as that may be

10.21.21  11:43 am   why can't you taste the moon?

     it's too far away

      how do you know it tastes like cheese?

      i'm assuming it does not. research suggests it's made of rock

10.21.21  11:03 am   what is your favorite shenanigan 

      going 'out to lunch'

10.21.21  11:00 am   Are you a Primal Alpha Dominant person?

      i doubt it

10.21.21  10:37 am   thoughts on the mandelbrot set?

      keeps me grounded

10.21.21  10:33 am   Sometimes I feel like reducing music to devices, chord progressions, or song layouts is at best interesting but missing the point and at worst disrespecting the music. How do you feel about that?

      it can be fun and useful to try, but the music will sooner or later find a way to break free, no matter what the rule was. this part is even more fun. don't worry, the music is not offended by categorization attempts. it only gets more excited, at a new chance to blow your mind again

10.21.21  8:02 am   if someone relates to your music, what do you feel about it?

      relatable

10.21.21  6:55 am   in an earlier answer you implied that at most 1% of the material in your videos is composed while you're not awake. what, if anything, is composed when you're not awake? 

      occasionally, a melody. if i'm really lucky there might be lyrics on it too

10.21.21  5:24 am   Where the fuck is New Zealand? 

      somewhere around (-41, 174)

10.21.21  5:04 am   would you include your visual style into your live performances if you could? 

      only through body language, singing, and dancing. probably similar to what you see me doing in the live action footage. no pre-recorded footage would be used in a live show

10.21.21  4:44 am   What was the hardest part to make in more than a dream?

      the hardest part was recovering from how long i allowed the whole thing to take. that took even more time

10.21.21  3:58 am   Do you get a dopamine kick every time you upload a video?

      close. it's more of a panic attack

10.21.21  3:44 am   You said that dreams makes sense, but lately I am having weird dreams that makes no sense or has no connection with my life and imagination.

     i didn't say it, i sang it, as part of a song. sometimes doing that is the most fun when the phrase seems poignantly false, such as in your experience

      How do I stop this weird dreams, pls help. 

      i'm not sure

10.21.21  3:18 am   why do you like music?

      i don't know. it likes me

10.21.21  1:16 am   Does the I'm A Princess / More Than A Dream actor have a name?

     person0000

     I am excited to see more of them!

     me too, although i'm also looking forward to multiple such persons being on screen at a time. perhaps with some differentiating traits

10.21.21  12:42 am   Hi bill. Beginner here. Im 13 years old, want to leRn all the keys, ( can only play 1 key: C#) and would like to know what makes your key chsnges so great. Do i start by learninf the keys first, or just find a chord that sounds like it belongs and ride on that?

      you can do everything in due time. almost in any order. just start having an enjoyable time with your instrument. use it while trying pursue joy, or anything else you think you want

10.20.21  11:41 pm   How would you explain to someone how to find the one when listening to a song?

      i'm not sure. how would you explain how to find the chin of a rotating face? i don't know that either

10.20.21  11:38 pm   In your song part of this webSITE, it says "Vacationing in the Center of the Sun."

      that's not true

10.20.21  11:11 pm   what was the bad thing you did

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

10.20.21  9:59 pm   have you ever heard of this guy called barack obama?

      yes
